page.title: 20TIME TABLE (DAIRY FARM)
page.content: A typical day at Gibson's dairy farm.At 5:45 a.m.Ian Allen cleans the filters and washes and fills the bins.At 6:00 a.m. start milking till 8:10 a.m.when Ian Gibson goes to breakfast on two weetabix and two slices of toast plus a cup of coffee which keeps him busy until 9.At 8:20 the milk tanker collects the milk, while Ian Allan is cleaning out.After breakfast they round up the dry stock and calves until 11:00 a.m.After that they do what ever needs done.At noon they have dinner.At 1:00 they do fencing or such like according to the time of year. At 4:00 milking is started again until 6:00. Cleaning out goes on until 6-30 p.m.At 6:30 after they do odd jobs that need doing.one.He has a supper of salad.
